name: El Presidente
description:
You're the general of an island. In this game you have to make decisions which have an impact on your island. The different actions you take will affect the approval of your people, the government money, the security of your island and the health of your island's people. 

Each decision should be well considered to ensure that  you can stay in power for as many weeks as possible and survive. (Not every week is a decision) You think you can rule a nation? Then go ahead and fight for your survival.
